products.title: Cottage Garden Poppy Red Roman Blind

Featuring a blend of colours, such as red and yellows intertwined with blues, greens and oranges, this multicoloured, multi-flowered pattern is as beautiful as it is detailed. products.title: Bird Garden, Denim - Roman Blind
products.description: Leave your guests feeling refreshed and relaxed by making use of the beautifully blue bird garden in denim. This pretty roman blind is home to a distressed blue base, so suited to its name, which features adorable white birds and blooms that sit delicately on the fabric. Boost a guest bedroom by including the denim as part of an overall blue and white colour scheme. Fuse with bolder and lighter shades of blue, using white as a tempering neutral.

products.title: Secret Garden Faux Silk Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Floral designs arent often considered when youre looking for contemporary furnishings, but this stunning and refined roman blind is definitely an exception. The climbing leaf pattern, with its painterly watercolour style, is cast in a palette of modern favourites, teals and floral designs arent often considered when youre looking for contemporary furnishings, but this stunning and refined roman blind is definitely an exception.

products.title: Bird Garden, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Surely the calmest and most tranquil of the bird garden range, the duck egg places muted aqua birds and florals on a distressed-look oatmeal base. Together, the two tones are cool and refreshing, with a vintage country vibe that you and your guests will fall in love with. Produce a pretty and relaxing home office, where you can concentrate and work with ease, by settling the duck egg amongst soft creams and matching aquas.

products.title: Bird Garden, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Certain to provide any space with modern vintage chic, the bird garden in charcoal displays an array of lovely birds and blooming florals in a snow white shade on a bed of distressed grey. This blind is pretty and sweet, absolute in forming a delightfully balmy and airy casual ambience in any surrounding. Combine the delicate grey shades with a vibrant mustard yellow for modern impact, or with a rich aubergine for ultimate contrast.

products.title: Bird Garden, Peony - Roman Blind
products.description: For a charmingly elegant style, including character and colour, use the bird garden in peony, where a scene of delicate florals, foliage, and charismatic songbirds feature in a romantic red tone against a wholesome, distressed cream base. Transform your dining area into a place of attractiveness and charm by accenting the peony against soothing ivory or country cream walls. To form a refined chic theme, combine the cherry red with highlighting fabrics, and incorporate similar, woodland and nature-inspired wall prints.

products.title: Bird Garden, Lavender - Roman Blind
products.description: On a distressed-look lilac base sit dainty birds and beautiful florals in the sweetly vintage bird garden lavender. The distinctive print adds charm and character, whilst the hue is one of wistful romance and calming tranquility. Craft yourself a peaceful realm to call your own by blending the lavender with matching soft whites in the master bedroom. Use varying shades of purple, such as lilac, heather, and aubergine, to emphasise the shades in the blind.

products.title: Bird Garden, Canvas - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporate the enchanting bird garden canvas into your dcor for a sophisticated look with charming detail, where a soft, cotton-like fabric hosts a display of feathered friends and creative foliage in soothing white on a mild oatmeal background. Display the canvas amid layers of splendid linen in harmonising caramel and biscuit shades, framing the blind with honeyed fabrics and complementing colours.

products.title: Gardenia Byzantium Roman Blind
products.description: Softly sweet and ever so sophisticated, this gardenia byzantium roman blind dresses your home with delicacy. Plus, its from their harlequin additions range, so you get the designer touch too. There are pastel tones of lilac and pistachio against a pale cream, with a simple rep softly sweet and ever so sophisticated, this gardenia byzantium roman blind dresses your home with delicacy.

products.title: Garden Flowers Grey Roman Blind
products.description: This busy pattern of flowers and leaves is full of country charm. Of course it is, it's been designed by the inimitable emma bridgewater and has all of her quirky personality. In this iteration, we've chosen a lovely modern grey tone so that you can easily pair it with your conte this busy pattern of flowers and leaves is full of country charm.

products.title: Gardenia Olivia Roman Blind
products.description: Green is often one of those overlooked colours for the home, but we think this gardenia olive roman blind from their harlequin additions range might start to turn heads. Its simple design makes a wonderful statement thanks to its large scale, whilst the injection of green helps green is often one of those overlooked colours for the home, but we think this gardenia olive roman blind from their harlequin additions range might start to turn heads.

products.title: Gardenia Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display. One of harlequins most loved designs, weve given this gardenia pattern a freshening up for their harlequin additions bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display.
